alert.note: Alert for East Marshall; East Polk; Kittson; Pennington; Red Lake; West Marshall (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 7:27PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Marshall, central Red Lake, east central Polk, southeastern Kittson and Pennington Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 726 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Carpenters Corner to near Oklee. Movement was north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Rosewood and Carpenters Corner around 735 PM CDT. Viking, Roland and Plummer around 740 PM CDT. Newfolden around 745 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include High Landing, Mavie, Goodridge and Strandquist. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Marshall; East Polk; Kittson; Pennington; Red Lake; West Marshall
